Cluster queue options

A UCSC BedGraph wigglegram track, showing the depth of coverage at each position, including the spliced read aligners.
A list of read aligners in SAM format. SAM is a compact short read aligner format that is increasingly being adopted.

A UCSC BED track of junctions reported by TopHat. Each junction consists of two connected BED blocks, where each block is as long as the maximal overhang of any read spanning the junction. The score is the number of aligners spanning the junction.
SAM file containing
Directory with chromosome subdirs containing input files. JBrowse output files will be printed to subdirs
